name: Fellow Bubs
description:
Our GMTK Game Jam 2021 entry!

We'll release an update after the voting period ends!

Controls:

  • Click a Bub to select him!
  • WASD / Arrow keys to move!
  • E to interact!
  • Space to jump!

Issues with the game jam build:

  • The music is broken on the last levels
  • The linux build isn't up to date, we didn't have time to update it
  • The emotion sharing and bonding mechanic isn't very useful due to oversights in level design
  • Interaction animations don't seem to play on the web build
